about.title: About Me
about.content:
I connect large-scale operations with advanced AI solutions. After managing 300+ team members from China, the Philippines, Malaysia, and Vietnam at Topvan Group, I founded ThinkerCafe to democratize AI education and enterprise automation.

My unique background combines international team leadership, deep AI/data science expertise, and 10+ years of teaching experience. I don't just build AI solutions‚ÄîI create systems that empower people to work smarter.

I am currently seeking opportunities to bring this combined expertise to enterprise AI consulting and digital transformation projects.

jobs.title: CEO & Founder
points: Led distributed US-Taiwan teams to develop AI education and automation products.
Designed comprehensive AI courses (Personal OS, AI Communication Skills, Visual/System Hacking Series).
Built LINE Bots, automation systems, and AI productivity tools.
Provided consulting services for enterprise AI solutions and workflow optimization.

jobs.title: Operations Manager
points: Directly led a 10-12 person team and indirectly managed 300+ members across China, the Philippines, Malaysia, and Vietnam.
Overseas assignments: Dubai Business Bay (4 months), Clark, Philippines (1.5 years), Makati/BGC (1 year).
Utilized Python and Telegram Bot API to enhance data-driven decision-making.
Managed all operations except finance and retail, reporting directly to the Chairman.

jobs.title: R&D Department Manager
points: Rebuilt team: Recruited new talent and reformed performance evaluations after 50%+ employee turnover.
Implemented Scrum development processes and internal/external testing environments.
Developed an operational anomaly notification system, automating processes with JIRA.
Resolved iOS certificate issues and IP blocking problems for in-house applications.

jobs.title: Head of Data Science Department
points: Established the Data Science Department from scratch.
Set up a complete environment within one month: Linux, Python, Docker, Jupyter, RStudio.
Predicted player churn and implemented retention strategies.
Detected arbitrage players and compiled quarterly operational reports.

jobs.title: Founder
points: Founded a project-based company, assembling freelance teams based on project needs.
Sanlih E-Television Vidol: Developed a web drama recommendation system.
Chunghwa Telecom: Provided big data Hadoop cluster consulting and maintenance.
E.SUN Bank: Implemented a cross-device member attribution mechanism.
ITRI College of Industry: Analyzed industry talent competency assessments and international corporate job vacancies.

jobs.title: Big Data R&D Engineer
points: Designed data collection processes and ETL pipelines.
Utilized statistical methods for data analysis to support decision-making.
Semantic analysis of patient diets: Built an emotion lexicon, developed a scoring model, and automated reports for the top five recommended/avoided foods for various diseases.

philosophy.title: Technical Philosophy
philosophy.content: My focus isn't on 'how many languages I know,' but on 'how quickly I can solve problems.' In the era of AI collaboration, the key isn't writing every line of code by hand, but rather: 1) knowing which tools to combine, 2) designing maintainable system architectures, and 3) understanding how to make AI your development partner.

items.title: Physical Therapy Clinic LINE Bot Appointment System
items.context: A newly opened clinic manually handled appointments daily, overwhelmed by phone calls.
painPoints: Spent 2 hours daily manually confirming appointments and making reminder calls
Phones constantly ringing, front desk overwhelmed, clients frustrated by wait times
Lack of systematic management often led to forgotten reminders or double bookings
deliverables: LINE Bot for automated appointments/cancellations/rescheduling, 24/7 availability
Automatic reminder notifications, reducing no-show rates
Integrated with Google Calendar for clear front desk overview

outcome.label: Actual Outcome
outcome.description:
Significant reduction in call volume, all appointments moved online
Front desk staff no longer constantly tied to the phone

items.title: NCKU Professor Lin's Research Project: TRA Disaster Recovery Analysis
items.context: Researching how long it takes Taiwan Railways Administration (TRA) to resume operations after service disruptions caused by earthquakes and typhoons.
painPoints: TRA's latest news scattered across various sources, too slow for manual compilation
Required long-term historical data tracking of suspension/resumption times
deliverables: Automated scraping of TRA's latest news for real-time updates
Structured storage: suspension time, resumption time, cause classification
Provided API for research team to directly access data
tech: Natural Language Processing (for key information extraction)

professor_review.label: Professor's Review
professor_review.quote: The work is sophisticated, data quality is excellent, and perfectly meets research needs.
